          <div class="row map-block">
           <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-6 map-block__text matchContainer">
            <h2>
             <strong>
              Stay close to Nature
             </strong>
            </h2>
            <p>
             Get close to nature with a Highlands Perthshire camping adventure amidst some of the best scenery Scotland has to offer. Meggernie is perfect for learning survival skills, environmental study or a more traditional camping experience.
            </p>
            <p>
             The remote, peaceful location is also ideal if you’re looking for a digital detox!
            </p>
            <p>
             You can pitch some tents and sleep under starlight or snuggle up in the cosy dorms for a memorable camping experience in this beautiful Highland haven. Adventurers of all ages will find plenty to discover in this natural playground.
            </p>
            <p>
             See our
             <a href="/sites/default/files/uploads/Meggernie.pdf">
              full activity list here
             </a>
            </p>
            <p>
             Prices available upon request
            </p>
            <p>
             Kerrowmore Farm
            </p>
            <p>
             Bridge of Balgie
            </p>
            <p>
             Glenlyon
            </p>
            <p>
             Aberfeldy
            </p>
            <p>
             Perthshire
            </p>
            <p>
             PH15 2PT
            </p>
            <p>
             <a href="/sites/default/files/uploads/SA%20Meggernie%20Directions%20Map.pdf">
              Directions
             </a>
            </p>

          <div class="centre-facilities">
           <div class="row accomodation">
            <h2>
             FACILITIES AND ACCOMMODATION
            </h2>
            <p class="larger">
             Camp or lodge? We've got it all.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="row accomodation accomodation--outdoor">
            <div class="row accomodation__intro-text">
             <div class="field field--name-field-cf-outdoor-accomodation field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field--item">
              <p>
               <strong>
                On-Site camping
               </strong>
              </p>
              <p>
               Camping at Meggernie is an incredible experience. With a number of naturally-sheltered and self-contained camping areas over 15 acres, each with their own unique character. Close by are the toilets and showers, a laundry, drying room and dishwashing/food preparation room and crystal clear drinking water is provided by our treated borehole supply.
              </p>
              <p>
               We also have the Foxes Den Bivvi and hammocks for a truly special camping experience.
              </p>
              <p>
               <br/>
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="row centre-facilities__button">
            <a class="button__link button--clean" href="/centre/meggernie/facilities">
             Maps and more
            </a>

          <div class="row promoted-blocks__adventure-experience img__cover">
           <div class="col">
            <img alt="Adventure experience image" class="img-responsive" src="/sites/default/files/2017-03/adventure%20experience%20image_0.jpg"/>
            <div class="promoted-blocks__adventure-experience__content">
             <h2>
              CHOOSE YOUR OWN SCHOOL ADVENTURE EXPERIENCE
             </h2>
             <p>
              It's your experience, so you're in charge. We believe that you should play a key role in designing your experience. To help, we have four basic products as a starting point:
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="row adventure-experience-block">
           <div class="col-lg-3 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 col adventure__wrapper" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/html">
            <div class="adventure__wrapper__inner">
             <div class="adventure__image__wrapper">
              <img alt="Adventure 50:50" class="first" src="/sites/default/files/2016-06/adventure-50-50.jpg"/>
              <img alt="3GSwingIcon" class="second" src="/sites/default/files/2016-08/3G%20Swing_320px.png"/>
             </div>
             <div class="adventure__text">
              <h3>
               Adventure 50:50
              </h3>
              <p>
              </p>
              <p>
               Split your time between self-led sessions and instructed activities. We can help you meet your learning objectives by providing activities, skills or simply the space you need.
              </p>
              <p>
               2-4 nights, full board accommodation in our lodges.
              </p>
              <p>
               <strong>
                Why?
               </strong>
               Mix of teacher time and structured activities.
              </p>
             </div>
             <div class="cta cta--download">
              <a href="/sites/default/files/2018-05/Adventure%205050.pdf">
               Download
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="row gallery-teaser">
           <div class="col-sm-12 gallery-teaser__left">
            <img alt="Meggernie " class="img-responsive" src="/sites/default/files/2017-06/Gallery%20cover%20image%20-%20Meg.jpg"/>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="row gallery-teaser--second">
           <a class="button__link button--clean" href="#" id="gallery--open">
            Open gallery
           </a>
          </div>
          <div class="row accreditations">
           <div class="col-md-8 col-sm-12 accreditations__main">
            <h2>
             LOCAL AREA INFORMATION
            </h2>
            <div class="row accreditations__main__description">
             <div class="col-md-6 col-sm-12">
              <p>
               <strong>
                Want more?
               </strong>
              </p>
              <p>
               Meggernie is located within a working Highlands estate in a truly stunning part of Scotland, offering a spectacular landscape for enjoying a huge range of outdoors pursuits. Glen Lyon is also within easy reach of the pretty towns and villages of Aberfeldy, Killin and Kenmore.
              </p>
              <ul>
               <li>
                Glen Lyon has been described as the “longest, loneliest, and loveliest glen in Scotland.” Enjoy its mystical atmosphere.
               </li>
               <li>
                Look out for the “oldest living thing in Europe” on the drive to Meggernie. The ancient Yew tree in nearby Fortingall is a real natural wonder.
               </li>
               <li>
                Aberfeldy offers lots of places to visit for a day out, including a distillery, Castle Menzies, and the bookshop and gallery at the Watermill. There's also a swimming pool and cinema.
               </li>
               <li>
                Loch Tay, the largest loch in Perthshire, is just a short drive away.
               </li>
               <li>
                Meggernie is on the edge of Ben Lawers National Nature Reserve, where you’ll find an amazing range of plants.
               </li>
               <li>
                Travel a little further afield to the city of Perth – 90 minutes away – where you’ll find museums and galleries and an awesome public swimming pool with flumes and waves and even an outdoor pool.
               </li>
              </ul>
             </div>
             <div class="col-md-6 col-sm-12 area_interest">
              <div class="area_interest__item">
               Nearest station: Crianlarich or Pitlochry
              </div>
              <div class="area_interest__item">
               Nearest town: Aberfeldy or Killin
              </div>
              <div class="area_interest__item">
               Nearest supermarket: Co-op in Aberfeldy or in Killin and Asda who deliver
              </div>
              <div class="area_interest__item">
               Nearest airport: Edinburgh or Glasgow
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
